title: Blind Channel: After Dark Side
overview: Blind Channel wants to be the world's most popular alternative rock band. To do that, they need to create an album that will propel them to global success. The revealing documentary series takes them into recording studios and behind the scenes of gigs across Europe and the United States. Behind the scenes, the band members also open up about their past struggles, from bullying at school to burnout, with unprecedented openness.
